metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8800 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function ui_clip_handle_data() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
